name: Nelo
description: Nelo is the lightning fast, out of this world, genre-blending, bullet-hell, character-action epic meticulously crafted by the loving couple at Magic & Mirrors.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista/7/8.1/10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-2400/AMD FX-8320 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 670, AMD Radeon HD 7870 or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 5 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for online gaming
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-4690k, AMD FX-8350 or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 390 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 12 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires broadband internet connection for online gaming
